column4: hello.. last week I was talking to someone asking what files to keep if I want to save email settings, passowrds, etc and they told me to save the /etc folder, but somewhere that lost me.. which files would I want to keep for these settings?
you could backup your home directory  i.e. /home/username
if you wanted to migrate over to ubuntu .. keep your /home/ directory intact, all settings should be portable.
